page.title: 10Bus Services in Knowle
page.content: The area is served by the W. M. P. E. service 151, 152 and 182 weekdays and 186/7 on Sundays. The 151/2 runs from Birm'hm to Dorridge and beyond via Solihull and Bentley Heath. The service is at half hourly intervals during mornings and evening peak hrs for commuters and schoolchildren and at hourly intervals during off peak hrs for shoppers who are mainly pensioners who travel free. It finishes at 6.30pm. The 182 runs from Birmingham to Dorridge via Solihull and Knowle at 20 minute intervals during peak hrs and half hourly in off peak hrs until 11.30pm. On Sundays the 186/7 runs at an alternate hourly frequency between Solihull ad Dorridge via Knowle (186) and Bentley Heath (187). A private bus service runs occasionally between Stratford and Solihull (July-Sept).
